Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is great for summarizing content and dividing large amounts of material into digestible bullet points. But the teacher is the most important point of learning.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAi has more descriptive feedback but can take the feedback out of the domain. Whereas a teacher will have direct but succinct feedback.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher has an idea of the most frequently asked questions giving them an advantage.
